page.title: Harrington Completes Heavyweight Match Play Field
page.text: LONDON (Reuters) - Ireland's Padraig Harrington completes an impressive 16-man field for next week's World Match Play Championship, organizers said Friday. The world number eight joins three other members of Europe's victorious Ryder Cup team, Lee Westwood, Miguel Angel Jimenez and Thomas Levet, and captain Bernhard Langer in the 41st Match Play at Wentworth, England.
